title: Grenade
author: Bruno Mars
lyrics:
[00:04.71] Easy come, easy go, that's just how you live
[00:08.01] Oh, take, take, take it all but you never give
[00:12.98] Should've known you was trouble from the first kiss
[00:16.70] Had your eyes wide open, ah, why were they open?
[00:21.35] Gave you all I had, and you tossed it in the trash
[00:25.45] You tossed it in the trash, you did
[00:29.75] To give me all your love is all I ever asked
[00:34.56] 'Cause what you don't understand is
[00:37.48] I'd catch a grenade for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[00:41.82] Throw my hand on a blade for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[00:45.72] I'd jump in front of a train for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[00:49.93] You know I'd do anything for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[00:54.58] Oh-oh, oh, I would go through all this pain
[00:59.83] Take a bullet straight through my brain
[01:03.50] Yes, I would die for you, baby
[01:07.12] But you won't do the same
[01:12.63] No, no, no, no
[01:17.28] Uh, black, black, black and blue, beat me 'til I'm numb
[01:21.47] Tell the devil I said "hey" when you get back to where you're from
[01:26.35] Madwoman, bad woman, that's just what you are
[01:30.09] Yeah, you'll smile in my face then rip the brakes out my car
[01:34.83] Gave you all I had, and you tossed it in the trash
[01:38.57] You tossed it in the trash, yes, you did
[01:43.16] To give me all your love is all I ever asked
[01:47.75] 'Cause what you don't understand is
[01:50.73] I'd catch a grenade for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[01:54.65] Throw my hand on a blade for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[01:59.14] I'd jump in front of a train for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[02:03.40] You know I'd do anything for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[02:07.96] Oh-oh, oh, I would go through all this pain
[02:13.17] Take a bullet straight through my brain
[02:16.81] Yes, I would die for you, baby
[02:20.38] But you won't do the same (no)
[02:23.95] If my body was on fire (no)
[02:28.01] Ooh, you'd watch me burn down in flames (no)
[02:32.13] You said you loved me, you're a liar
[02:35.01] 'Cause you never, ever, ever did, baby
[02:41.57] 
[02:46.07] Uh, but darling, I'd still catch a grenade for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[02:51.09] Throw my hand on a blade for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[02:55.19] I'd jump in front of a train for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[02:59.59] You know I'd do anything for ya (yeah-yeah-yeah)
[03:03.92] Oh-oh, oh-oh, I would go through all this pain, yeah
[03:09.13] Take a bullet straight through my brain
[03:13.38] Yes, I would die for you, baby
[03:16.55] But you won't do the same
[03:21.44] No, you won't do the same
[03:24.90] You wouldn't do the same
[03:29.29] Ooh, you'll never do the same
[03:33.12] No, no, no, no
[03:36.47]
